Title: Sweet Revenge
Writer: B.J. Perla (screenplay by), Marilyn Goldin (screenplay by), B.J. Perla (story by)
Actors: Stockard Channing, Sam Waterston, Franklyn Ajaye, Richard Daughty
Plot: A young woman with a long rap sheet who steals cars for a living is befriended by a public defender who tries to steer her straight. But her goal is to steal and subsequently sell enough cars (sometimes the same car more than once) to buy a new Ferrari.
